name: 1st Conference on Health Crises and Education and 1st Conference on Crises in Healthcare
content: Themes include Medical Education, Education, Compassionate care, the emotional crisis among clinicians and practitioners, pediatric care in the pandemic, and virtual consultations. Guest Speakers include Elizabeth Rider, Director, Boston Children’s Hospital / Harvard Medical School Faculty Fellowships in Humanism & Professionalism, and Interprofessional Leadership, Division of General Pediatrics, Department of Pediatrics, Boston Children’s Hospital, and Department of Pediatrics, Harvard Medical School, and Howard Beckman, Clinical Professor of Medicine, Family Medicine and Public Health Sciences at the University of Rochester School of Medicine and Dentistry. See https://hedra.eu/conferences/.
